show_name: In Search of the Lost Future (TV)
other_title: À la recherche du futur perdu (French)
失われた未来を求めて (Japanese)
plot: The Astronomy Club of the protagonist Sou Akiyama is filled with the big names on campus. Just before the festival on October 1, the club receives a request from the student executive committee to calm the uneasiness among the students. There are reports of ghost sightings, accidents, sleeping sickness, and other mysterious incidents at the old building. When Yui Furukawa, a quiet girl who transferred late into the school, appears before Sou, the gears of fate slowly begin to move.
ending_theme: "Ashita Mata Aeru yo ne" (明日また会えるよね;We'll Meet Again Tomorrow, Right?) by Hatsumi Takada & Akane Tomonaga
